description: This file is a Dart script that automates continuous integration (CI) tasks for a Flutter project. It runs commands like 'pub get', 'analyze', and 'test' within the correct project directory, ensuring proper environment setup during CI runs.

methods.name: _run
methods.description: Asynchronously starts a process with specified command and arguments, streams its output and error to current process's stdout and stderr, and returns the process's exit code.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the script, which interprets command-line arguments and executes corresponding Flutter commands ('pub get', 'analyze', 'test', 'all') after verifying the presence of pubspec.yaml in the project root.
